= brackets at the end of each row contain the total number of stitches for that row notes the chain row is counted as row 1 there are no turning chains after the initial chain row 1 this allows for straighter edges increases only occur at the end of every other row odd numbered row only this means to work 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch of odd row sizing measure your head to determine proper size needed this pattern is written for ahead circumference of 21 inches the number of row can be reduced for a tighter fit or smaller head size or increased for a looser fit or larger head size average creation time ranged from 3 to 5 hours for personal use only all rights reserved by 3 bzypeach instructions q row 1 chain chain 13 or enough stitches to measure approximately 2 inches 5 cm 13 q row 2 turn half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook half_double_crochet in the next 11 chains do not count the skipped chain as a stitch on this row 12 q row 3 turn half_double_crochet in the first stitch half_double_crochet in the next 10 stitches increase increase 13 q row 4 turn half_double_crochet in the first stitch half_double_crochet in the next 12 stitches 13 q row 5 turn half_double_crochet in the first stitch half_double_crochet in the next 11 stitches increase increase 14 q row 6 turn half_double_crochet in the first stitch half_double_crochet in the next 13 stitches 14 q row 7 turn half_double_crochet in the first stitch half_double_crochet in the next 12 stitches increase increase 15 q row 8 turn half_double_crochet in the first stitch half_double_crochet in the next 14 stitches 15 for personal use only all rights reserved by 4 bzypeach instructions continued q row 9 and all odd row will end with an increase increase q row 10 and all even row will be the same number of stiches from the previous row no increases on these row q work to row 85 or until neckline edge equals 21 inches 53 34 cm
